data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 17,602 believers in Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg, Hungary
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg, Hungary.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 17,602 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 17,602 believers in the state of Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Jew, Hungarian-speaking people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg, Hungary to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

location.name: Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg
